sentences: She was born in Leningrad, and studied with Galina Ustvol'skaya in Leningrad and with Orest Yevlakhov at the Leningrad Conservatory.
In 1960 she took a position teaching at a children's music school and began to compose in other genres.
Songs of the Great Way for voice and piano, 1958 (Walt Whitman words)
Smeyantsi, cantata for children's chorus, percussion, piano, 1981
